arc

Class TextInputFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • arc.TextInputFile

  • public class TextInputFile
extends java.lang.Object

    ARC TextInputFile

    This class allows you to open up a text file for reading

    Since:
    2017-04-20
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alfred Cadawas

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextInputFile(java.lang.String strFileName)
      Open a text file for reading based on an input file name

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the text file
      boolean eof()
      Check to see of the the file is at the end and return true if it is
      char readChar()
      Read a line of text from the opened text file and get the first character
      double readDouble()
      Read a line of text from the opened text file and convert it to a double
      int readInt()
      Read a line of text from the opened text file and convert it to an integer
      java.lang.String readLine()
      Read a line of text from the opened text file

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextInputFile

        public TextInputFile(java.lang.String strFileName)
        Open a text file for reading based on an input file name
        Parameters:
        strFileName - name of the file you would like to open for reading

    • Method Detail

      • eof

        public boolean eof()
        Check to see of the the file is at the end and return true if it is
        Returns:
        true if the "cursor" is at the end of file, false if it isn't

      • readLine

        public java.lang.String readLine()
        Read a line of text from the opened text file
        Returns:
        a String of a line read from the file

      • readInt

        public int readInt()
        Read a line of text from the opened text file and convert it to an integer
        Returns:
        an integer converted from a line read from the file

      • readDouble

        public double readDouble()
        Read a line of text from the opened text file and convert it to a double
        Returns:
        a double converted from a line read from the file

      • readChar

        public char readChar()
        Read a line of text from the opened text file and get the first character
        Returns:
        the first character taken from a line read from the file

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the text file
